message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you this product is worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. This is a chance to secure a significant investment with a high potential return. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss further details. If not, I have another buyer lined up who's willing to pay $1000000.
